name: Alphabet Soup (mrVentures)
description:
Alphabet Soup conveys the experience of a queer youth sifting through the fragmented queer identity. Inspired by the story of "Are You My Mother?", wherein a little bird looks for its mom, this narrative follows a protagonist who seeks to find their identity through a dialogue with the internet. 

This game is a prequel to https://mrventures.itch.io/coming-out

PC Executable: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1W1CpEczjhsZmZzCh9F6dV_aWsFlgHIhO
